Header.title: Coming Soon!
Header.paragraph: The way we work and hire is evolving.

Why2: Share projects, components, and content with people looking to hire you.

Clients.name: Subscriptions
Clients.text: The more you engage the more likely you'll keep your followers month after month.

Clients.name: Event Shoutouts/Hosting
Clients.text: Birthdays, Anniversarys, or any special event gathering you name your price for virutal or in person shows.

Clients.name: Pay Per View
Clients.text: Take the camera on the road and enjoy the extra revenue of near limitless seating or skip the road and host a speacial event.

Clients.name: Merchandise
Clients.text: Tshirts and more Merchandise is one of your biggest money makers. Sell gear to Freelancers.

Clients.name: Fan Mail
Clients.text: Your biggest fan  is out there and willing to bid on dming you!

Clients.name: Influencer Endorsements
Clients.text: Place your availabilty and go with the highest bid cancel if your minimum reserve is not met. Not limited to one platform YOU ARE A BRAND

Freelancers.title: Subscriptions
Freelancers.text: Subscribe to your favorite Artist for exclusive content as a super follower within there group.

Freelancers.title: Reconginiztion Feed
Freelancers.text: Clients drop 15 second shortclip versus videos while connecting with new Freelancers.

Freelancers.title: Groups
Freelancers.text: Fan Groups to connect like minded Freelancers with there favorite Clients for exclusive music and more.

Freelancers.title: PPV
Freelancers.text: Watch your favorite Artist on Tour live from your couch or anywhere.
